exec.label: Install
exec.command: run-as-root apt install -y unace rar unrar p7zip-rar p7zip zip unzip sharutils uudeview mpack arj cabextract

undo.label: Remove
undo.command: run-as-root apt purge -y unace rar unrar p7zip-rar p7zip zip unzip sharutils uudeview mpack arj cabextract

status.command: dpkg -s unace rar unrar p7zip-rar p7zip zip unzip sharutils uudeview mpack arj cabextract
